figure_1: General structural formula for E 472a: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents an acetyl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remaining position has either an acetyl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen
figure_2: General structural formula for E 472b: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents a lactyl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remainder position has either a lactyl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen
figure_3: General structural formula for E 472c: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents a citryl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remaining position has either a citryl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen
figure_4: General structural formula for E 472d: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents a tartaryl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remaining position has either a tartaryl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen
figure_5: General structural formula for E 472e: where at least one of R1, R2 or R3 represents a monoacetyltartaryl moiety or diacetyltartaryl moiety and a fatty acyl moiety and the remaining position has either a monoacetyltartaryl moiety or diacetyltartaryl moiety or fatty acyl moiety or hydrogen but also acetyl moiety or tartaryl moiety
